search_query: Theme From Jaws John Williams Airplane!

match_score.reasoning: Candidate 1 is the most authentic and official recording of the 'Theme From Jaws' by John Williams among the provided options. It is an official upload from the 'John Williams - Topic' channel, provided by Universal Music Group, and explicitly credits John Williams as the composer, lyricist, conductor, and producer for the 'Main Title' from the 'Jaws' soundtrack, released in 1975. This strongly indicates it is the original, canonical recording of the theme. While the video title is 'Main Title' instead of 'Theme From Jaws', 'Main Title' is a common and official designation for the primary theme of a film's soundtrack. The other candidates are either unofficial uploads, live performances by different orchestras, or by John Williams but not necessarily the original soundtrack recording.
